articles.title: GameStop shares surge in early deals, on course to extend rally - Reuters
articles.description: GameStop ended 7.3% higher on Wednesday after wild gyrations in the resurgent rally that has vaulted shares of the video game retailer and other so-called meme stocks closer to the peaks of late January.
